summary: This document contains a correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Epstein, specifically detailing cash wire instructions and asset transfers to Pershing LLC. It involves multiple individuals from Deutsche Bank discussing the logistics of these financial transactions.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is involved in the financial transactions and asset transfers related to Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is included in the correspondence regarding the asset transfers and is likely coordinating the process.

persons.name: Janet Young
persons.context: Janet Young initiates the correspondence regarding the asset transfers to Pershing LLC.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurcedhich
persons.context: Lisa D Hurcedhich is copied on the correspondence regarding the asset transfers.

persons.name: Harry Ballet
persons.context: Harry Ballet is also included in the correspondence regarding the asset transfers.

connections.description: Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby are both associated with Deutsche Bank and are involved in the asset transfer process.
Janet Young communicates with Amanda Kirby regarding the asset transfers, indicating a working relationship.
Janet Young includes Lisa D Hurcedhich in the correspondence about asset transfers, suggesting a collaborative effort.
Vahe Stepanian and Harry Ballet are both part of the Deutsche Bank team working on the asset transfers.

events.title: Asset Transfer Coordination
events.description: Coordination of asset transfers to Pershing LLC is discussed, including cash wire instructions and details of the assets involved.

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of assets totaling EUR 291,846.67 to Pershing LLC.
Cash wire instructions are provided for the transfer, indicating a financial transaction involving multiple parties.
The correspondence includes multiple individuals from Deutsche Bank discussing the logistics of the asset transfer.
There are references to specific financial instruments and accounts involved in the transfer process.
The document is marked as confidential, indicating the sensitive nature of the information discussed.
